constraints_details.result: Hinterland Lower Lea Valley including Stratford

description: Demolition of existing buildings and erection of part 2 to 8 storey buildings to provide commercial floorspace falling within classes A1, A2, B1, B8 and/or D1 together with 64 dwellings (comprising 21 x 1 bed; 20 x 2 bed; 20 x 3 bed; 2 x 4 bed and 1 x 5 bed), access arrangements, bicycle parking and refuse/re-cycling facilities.
